friday.title: Opening Ceremony
friday.description: Those that cannot make the opening ceremony no worries! We have you covered with a live stream!

friday.title: Jeopardy
friday.description: What is … answering questions to win an AWESOME prize?? Head to the Live Stream Studio to join in on all the Jeopardy action.

saturday.title: Password
saturday.description: Can you and a pal guess the password with only one word clues? Bring a friend to the live stream studio to play a Tonight Show classic game!

saturday.title: Red Bull Chug
saturday.description: CHUG! CHUG! CHUG! CHUG! Come shotgun a can to get your weekend started on the 3rd floor!

saturday.title: Emoji Translator
saturday.description: Emoji game on point?? Head to the Live Stream studio to see if you can read our emoji phrases!

saturday.title: $100,000 Pyramid
saturday.description: Ready to step into the winners circle? Come join us in the Live Stream studio to play this classic game show game and maybe even win a cool prize!

saturday.title: Name That Tune
saturday.description: Do you know your music? Head on down to the Live Stream studio to test your music knowledge!

saturday.title: Hacker Squad (Family) Feud
saturday.description: It’s time to play the feud! Bring your hacker squad to the Live Stream studio and test your groups knowledge!

saturday.title: Karaoke
saturday.description: La La La Laaaa! Show us your vocal skills on the main floor and maybe even win a prize!

sunday.description: No Live Stream event has been schedule for this day
